Text: Is that uncut version or previous Korean cut?

Can anyone comment on whether this is a convert from the recent bluray rip, or whether this is a real retail source DVDR? 
I'm primarily interested in knowing whether the audio is legit 5.1, or a convert from the 2.0 BR rip.

I just downloaded this - there's a watermark in the middle of the image throughout the goddamn film. Luckily it's very faint, but it will annoy most people I believe. 
The audio is obviously converted from 2.0 to 5.1 - if you turn your system from 5.1 to stereo you loose nothing: no effects, no dialog. Meaning, it's not real 5.1 audio, but 2.0 put through a converter.
Thanks for selling my ISP another 4.36 gig, uploader!
Actually I was wrong about the watermark; there is none and the image is good. But the audio certainly IS only stereo converted to 5.1. AKA fake surround sound.
